name: Magic On The Dance Floor
description:
Oh sure, you're great at crafting and casting spells. You're fantastic at scaring villagers with hideous monsters that you turn loose in the night. You may have even amassed great treasure and magical devices in your adventures.

But Wizard, can you dance?

Welcome to the Wizard's Club, where Wizards of all stripes come to let their hair down from under those pointy hats, rub shoulders with their peers and prove who is the mightiest on the dance floor.

Oh and it's your first time here,  so you're going to have to survive a Dance Off, or you'll be shown the door!

From Bahototh, CROMartin and Will comes another fun lighted-hearted romp-with-a-challenge video game. Get ready to move quick, impress the crowd and bring everybody to the floor in Magic On The Dance Floor!
